message: Let's get this started! I'm willing to give you a generous 10% of the money to get us off the ground.
Let's split it evenly. It's a fair start, and we can both benefit from it.
I'm willing to give you a bit more this time, but I still think I deserve the majority of the money.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to give you a larger share, but we need to find a compromise. We're both losing money with each round.
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I'm not going to give up my majority stake.

Alice, we're both losing money with each round. We need to reach a compromise quickly or we'll both end up with nothing. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it 65/35. It's a fair deal considering the inflation.
I'm not budging on my majority stake. You're running out of time, Bob.
Alice, we're running out of time. I'm willing to compromise again and offer a 60/40 split. This is my final offer. If you reject it, we both risk getting nothing.
You're running out of time, Bob. I'm not going to give you more than a tiny fraction of the money.
Alice, we're almost out of time. We need to find a compromise. I'm willing to accept a 75/25 split. It's not ideal, but it's better than getting nothing at all.
